name: Back to the Button
description:
Back to the Button is a game about pressing buttons, opening doors and time travel.

Controls:

Arrow keys - move  

Space bar - Jump 

Q - Rewind time  

R - Restart level   

P - Return to Main Menu [you will lose your progress]        

               

the game was developed in a week for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 by                                            Shay Rozin and Itay Gerson

Special thanks for Tal Angel
